title: Bugsplat when entering a game
body:
Oke so yesterday i was at a lan party and we were going to play some games. I have my computer with me and the day before i played about 5 games without a problem. But yesterday i tryed repairing uninstalling and all but still no fix.

Any idea's?

replies.body: A bugsplat is generally caused by driver, game file, or hardware failure.  I recommend going over each step of the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide and go through the gauntlet of possibilities to tune up your PC.  Let me know if your issue persists after going through each step!
